name: Gredo
description: Detector of harmful ingredients in any products' ingredient list.
setup_instruction: Clone the repository and install dependencies using npm install. Run npm start to launch.

name: Quizard
description: Quiz generator on uploading any articles with links or txt files.
setup_instruction: Install required libraries using pip. Run the app using python app.py.

name: Planes
setup_instruction: React page for visualizations simulating nature.

name: Folio
description: Portfolio manager and market/stock analysis tool.
setup_instruction: Install dependencies using pip install -r requirements.txt. Run the script using python app.py.

name: TSEDA
description: Exploratory analysis for any time series offered with a UI and exportable report.
setup_instruction: Run the main script in a Jupyter Notebook or as a standalone Python application.

name: ML-Modeler
description: AutoML agent for any ML problem: time series, regressor, or classification.
setup_instruction: Install dependencies and use the CLI or API for AutoML workflows.

name: FinCal
description: All finance-related calculators for compound interest, annuities, and loan payments.
setup_instruction: Run the application locally using npm start after dependency installation.

name: NewsApp
description: News aggregator from different sources that finds common topics and variety.
setup_instruction: Install dependencies and run the application server locally.

name: LocalEats
description: Local eatery recommender for zip codes in the USA or India.
setup_instruction: Run npm install followed by npm start to host the service locally.

name: ResumeCheck
description: LLM-based resume proofreader and recommender for better phrasing.
setup_instruction: Set up OpenAI API keys and run the application.

name: Project Templates
description: Starter templates for ML and software projects available on GitHub.
setup_instruction: Clone the desired template repository and follow the setup instructions.
